title: Nominis
description:
Effortless crypto compliance with Nominis.  

NOMINIS is an AI-powered AML/KYT platform for crypto businesses, financial institutions, and Web3 startups. Fully automated, it saves up to 80% of time and costs compared to manual tools. Detect illicit activity and real-time screen wallets, and leverage AI-driven investigations for accurate risk assessments. Seamlessly integrate compliance with a plug-and-play API, keeping your business secure without slowing growth.
